attributes.action: Ken Clarke to be the new ECB Chairman of Selectors
attributes.additional_details:
We need Ken Clarke to bring his common sense and good judgement to an institution that needs desperate reform: the England cricket team. Ideally he can combine this role alongside his chairmanship of both CAMRA and the Curry Club.

Now Ken has left the cabinet, we need him in public life. Sign the petition if you value your country!

rejection.details: This would be a matter for the ECB.
